settings.info: We would just like to say thank you for being a part of our family.

settings.content: [Here the links to help files, online documentation, and videos and other tutorials, to help make this process easier and more enjoyable for you](https://help.arenacommerce.com/electro).

If you are unable to find an answer to your questions, you can always submit a [support ticket and one of our global support gurus will personally assist you](https://arenathemes.freshdesk.com/support/tickets/new).

settings.label: Enable Mega Navigation
settings.info: To add Mega navigation, go to Sections > Header > click Add content

settings.content: If you select Smart Search app, please [Register Here](http://www.searchanise.com/get/arenacommerce)
Smart search will automatically activate when you install the app. So if you want to use other options, please delete the app

settings.label: Enable Compare
settings.info: After activation, you will need to install [Wishlist Compare Plus ](https://apps.shopify.com/wishlist-compare)

settings.label: Source
settings.info: Multiple Currencies By Shopify only available for stores using Shopify Payments. Please refer to [enabled selling in multiple currencies](https://help.shopify.com//en/manual/payments/shopify-payments/multi-currency/setup)

settings.label: Auto Currency Switcher
settings.info: Go to 'Currencies to support' field to add your currencies

settings.content: Separate your currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. [Click here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) for a complete list of currency codes. Example: CAD USD.
You can use [Shopify Native Language](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/cross-border/multilingual-online-store) to selling in multiple languages

settings.label: Background image
settings.info: The width of image is 1920 pixel. Only for template are customers or page. For other templates, please upload in Sections

settings.label: Redirect to Checkout on Add to Cart
Display messages to remind free shipping offer
Select variants by clicking their images
Sticky Add to cart on Mobile
EU Cookie Policy
settings.info: All cookie text could be found on Edit Languages > General > Cookie
Phone number icon, Account icon, search icon, cart icon, etc...

settings.label: Image
settings.info: Shown when sharing a link on social media. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) about image thumbnails.

settings.content: Fomo Popups display real-time customer activity notifications on your store. You can use it as a Social Proof Markteting Tool to Boost Conversions

settings.info: Template: Line 1:'Some one in' {Random City} {Random Text}. Line 2: {Random Products}. Line 3: {Random Number} {Random Text}

options.label: Customer Location Geo IP - Lists of cities by country

settings.label: Manual Cities List
settings.info: To use multiple values please add a separator ;. E.g: New York;London

settings.label: Line 1: Random Text
settings.info: To use multiple values please add a separator ;. E.g: just bought;view

settings.label: Line 2: Random Product in Collection:
settings.info: If no category is selected, it will select randomly from all products

settings.label: Line 3: Random Number
settings.info: To use multiple values please add a separator ;. E.g: 2;3;4;10

settings.label: Line 3: Random Text
settings.info: To use multiple values please add a separator ;. E.g: hours ago;days ago

settings.info: For best results [all product photos should be the same ratio](https://help.shopify.com/manual/productivity-tools/image-editor#image-aspect-ratio).
